text: im in the middle of the HubSpot cms for developers certification and in the video he adds a section for text color and says to click the design tab, but when i look at my site i donâ€™t have the design tab and my layout looks different. what am i missing?
the design tab is where you used to find the link to theme settings, but I'm not sure if that was also where the "Style" tab options started out.
